name: "Scritchy Sam" by Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
description: [Digital drawings created on my phone then moshed and compiled, also on my phone.] Sam is a scritchy, itchy critter! He's a jump and jiver, but in this home movie, shot by his uncle, Chester, there is actual footage of Sam being POSSESSED by a strange disco force! ---Richard F. Yates (Holy Fool)
